overview: Emma (Savanna) and Steve are getting married and the wedding has to take place, strangely enough, in the Master Bath of his mansion.  Just when you think it couldn't get any weirder...it does. When the Bride suddenly falls for the Best Man, and the Groom for the Bridesmaid!  Throw your expectations out the window. this is the wildest wedding in history! The Wedding, from Vivid. Go ahead Make a commitment
title: The Wedding
